var.name: SMFTMP
var.description: temperature above which snowmelt happens (degree C)

var.name: c1_factor
var.description: factor used to calculate c1, and c1 is used in reference evaporation calculation

var.name: c2_factor1
var.description: factor used to calculate c2, and c2 is used in reference evaporation calculation

var.name: c2_factor2
var.description: factor used to calculate c2, and c2 is used in reference evaporation calculation

var.name: c3_factor1
var.description: factor used to calculate c3, and c3 is used in reference evaporation calculation

var.name: c3_factor2
var.description: factor used to calculate c3, and c3 is used in reference evaporation calculation

var.name: c5
var.description: factor used in reference evaporation calculation

var.name: para_r
var.description: root density ratio of deepest soil layer

var.name: ss_f
var.description: slope shape (concave or convex) factor,0.03 is for linear or convex slope
